input.sentences: we went to the harbor in the afternoon .
we saw some cool looking matching costumes for the 4th that day .
they had a plane doing sky writing .

output.sentences: We were at the harbor this afternoon.
All day, people wore matching costumes.
There was even a plane writing in the sky.
At one point, the plane drew a heart.
There were even one balloons stuck in the trees.
